DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group , placebo-controlled study evaluate efficacy safety bitopertin ( RO4917838 ) combination selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) patient obsessive-compulsive disorder . Patients randomize receive either bitopertin 30 mg bitopertin 10 mg placebo orally daily addition background therapy SSRI . Anticipated time study treatment 16 week .
